name: Newborn Baby Elf Hat-Blue, Grey and White
description:
This cute elf hat is hand knit in pastel blue, grey and white and features a full bouncy pom pom at the end of it's medium length tail 
This little hat will fit the average newborn baby and is perfect for those first photos.

TURN AROUND TIME:
All orders are custom made at the time of purchase and will ship out 2-3 weeks of receiving payment. 


Please ALWAYS supervise babies,NEVER leave baby unattended while wearing any hat that has a long tail as this could pose a hazard.

Materials-Acrylic Yarn
Care- Handwash cool,Do Not wring or twist,lay flat to dry

Lovely photo courtesy of ElvieDiazPhotography.com

name: Textured News Boy Newborn Baby Hat in Pastel Blue
description:
I crocheted this little newsboy hat in a pastel blue colored fiber. It features a textured stitch and a sweet little brim, it's sized to fit a newborn.

Turn Around Time:
This little hat is made to order and will ship out approximately 2-3 weeks from time of ordering.

Color Options:
This little hat is shown in Pastel Blue but also comes in, Chocolate Brown, Denim Blue, Hot Pink, Pastel Pink, Navy and Linen

Size:
This listing is for a newborn baby hat.
If you're needing a 0-3 month size please leave me a note when completing your order.

Care:
Hand wash and rinse, lay flat to dry.

Photo Credit:
www.AshleySimonsPhotography.com

name: Newborn Baby Hat "Little Miss Checker Head" in Hot Pink
description:
This sweet little hand knit hat features a checker board pattern and is topped off with 2 pom poms. Perfect newborn photography Prop!

Turn Around Time:
This is a made to order hat and take approximately 2-3 weeks to be created and shipped out.

Photo Credit:
www.JackieRansonPhotography.com

name: Newborn Baby Earflap Hat with Rosette Tan with Ecru Trim 0-3 months
description:
Newborn Baby Earflap Hat

**All orders are custom made at the time of purchase and will ship out 2-3 weeks of receiving payment. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me**

This super cute earflap hat is hand crocheted in tan and has ecru trim, the rosette adds a nice finishing touch, it will fit the average 0-3 month old baby.

Color Options:
This hat can be made in any combination of colors, please specify colors when ordering. If no colors are noted you will receive the hat in the photo.

**If you're needing "True Newborn" (0-4weeks) please leave me a note in the "message to the seller" area when you're completing the order process.

**Larger sizes are priced higher, please convo me for details.

***Please ALWAYS supervise babies,NEVER leave baby unattended while wearing any hat that has a long tail or tie strings as this could pose a hazard.

Materials-Acrylic Yarn
Care- Handwash cool,Do Not wring or twist,lay flat to dry
Circumference-Approximately 12"
Hat Height-Approximately 5 1/2"

All hats will stretch an additional 2"-3" beyond their resting measurements

I try to display accurate pictures of my items, please keep in mind that colors may vary monitor to monitor.

A BIG thank you to Ashley Munn from AshleyMunnPhotography.com for the lovely photo:)

name: Newborn Baby Hat, Bi Color Topknot Hat
description:
This sweet little topknot hat is pictured in Cream with a Honey brim and features a textured stitch separating the colors. 

Turn Around Time:
This little hat is custom made and will ship out in 2-3 weeks from time of purchase.

Color Options:
This hat can be made in just about any color combination, leave a note of your color choices for the body and brim of the hat when you're checking out. 
If no color choice is indicated you will receive the hat in the photo.

Photo Credit:
AimeeFullerPhotography.com
